DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare effectiveness PriMatrix Moist Wound Therapy ( MWT ) Standard Care MWT treatment chronic diabetic foot ulcer subject diabetes mellitus without significantly compromise arterial circulation .
DOC.brief_title: Health Economic Assessment Lower Extremity Diabetic ( HEALED ) Ulcers With PriMatrix
DOC.detailed_description: This study multi-center , prospective , randomize single-blinded study evaluate efficacy PriMatrix MWT versus Standard Care MWT achieve complete wound closure chronic diabetic foot ulcer 12 week ( 84 day ) . To measure wound recidivism change functional quality life , subject complete Cardiff Wound Impact Schedule SF-36v2™ three time point study ) initial screening , ii ) completion treatment phase , iii ) 24 week ( post-randomization ) . Additionally , data obtain SF-36v2™ used economic evaluation treatment arm .
DOC.criteria: Type I Type II diabetes A diabetic foot ulcer locate foot ankle least one square centimeter Suspected confirm signs/symptoms wound infection Hypersensitivity bovine collagen
